name: x-reference
author: Dmitry Sheiko
description: The reference element retrieves and displays a fragment of a specified external resource matching given grep condition or selector

documentation.description: The reference element retrieves and displays a fragment of a specified external resource matching given grep condition or selector

events.click: Firing this event will cause the element to show up a modal with the content retrieved from external resource

methods.openModal: Show up a modal with the content retrieved from external resource
